Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Orlando East - UCF Area in Orlando, you'll be convenient to Congo River Golf - East Orlando and Florida Technical College. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Waterford Lakes Town Center and University of Central Florida Art Gallery.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 149 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a health club and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Orlando? This hotel has 5600 square feet (520 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Congo River Golf - East Orlando - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Florida Technical College - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Waterford Lakes Town Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
University of Central Florida Art Gallery - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
St. Matthews University - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
University of Central Florida - 4 km / 2.5 mi
University of Central Florida Arena - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Bright House Networks Stadium - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Twin Rivers Golf Course - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi

Winter Pines Golf Club - 10.3 km / 6.4 mi
Ventura Country Club - 11 km / 6.8 mi
Orlando Speedworld - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Orlando Fashion Square - 13.1 km / 8.1 mi
Albin Polasek Museum and Sculpture Gardens - 13.6 km / 8.5 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Orlando East - UCF Area is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 18.1 km / 11.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Radisson Hotel Orlando-UCF is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi.
